Plot: In 1988, a teenage girl's life is thrown into chaos when her mother disappears.
Title: White Bird in a Blizzard
Writer: Gregg Araki (screenplay), Laura Kasischke (based on the novel by)
Actors: Shailene Woodley, Eva Green, Christopher Meloni, Shiloh Fernandez
tomatoConsensus: Part suburban thriller, part sexual awakening drama -- and fully convincing as neither -- White Bird in a Blizzard rests a little too heavily on Shailene Woodley's typically superlative work.
